posts.post_content:
Selling a 15 card complete player subset of the Washington senators. Would love to keep it but can’t. It took me quite a while to put the set together, let me save you the trouble. Mostly piedmont backs, some polar bears and a few Sweet Caporals. Asking $1500 shipped.

[url]https://imgur.com/gallery/dscwWZf[/url]
Price Reduction-$1300- shame I need to let it go but the liquidity is extremely important at the moment. P.m. me for high definition photos of each card. Willing to strike a deal
Actually on second thought- it is Christmas after all! $1000 buys the set of 15, after December 26, it will go back to 1300. Ho ho ho!

Plz reserve for me.  I am making the assumption that the cards are not altered or trimmed and that Johnson is as it looks and doesn’t have have paperloss or back damage.  If the cards are how they appear I will purchase.  However, I’d greatly appreciate high res emailed images so that I can truly understand what I’m buying - [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
I'll take them for $1000 if Scott doesn't want them.

[quote name="scottglevy" post=2046898]Plz reserve for me.  I am making the assumption that the cards are not altered or trimmed and that Johnson is as it looks and doesn’t have have paperloss or back damage.  If the cards are how they appear I will purchase.  However, I’d greatly appreciate high res emailed images so that I can truly understand what I’m buying - [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url][/QUOTE]

Emailed you scans.

Received scans.  Good looking group of cards - The Johnson is a bit more creased than I thought ... and while I’d lean towards purchasing the lot anyway, it’s no longer a “must have”.  For that reason, I’d rather give the other interested party first dibs.  If for some reason they don’t want it email me again
All reservations/Dib’s have been cleared out. Still for sale!
The set is still for sale... make me an offer! :)

Would you mind emailing me photos of this lot KaiserCurt, I would greatly appreciate it. Thanks!

[url]throckmj2004@yahoo.com[/url]

[quote name="cash4cards" post=2053528]Would you mind emailing me photos of this lot KaiserCurt, I would greatly appreciate it. Thanks!

[url]throckmj2004@yahoo.com[/url][/QUOTE]

Email sent
This set is still for sale… Make me an offer
